title: How to Make Ginger Orange Tea

steps.headline: Peel and slice the ginger root into small pieces.
steps.description: Put them in a pot with 2 cups of water and just barely boil.

steps.headline: Fish the ginger pieces out of the water or leave them in.
Add honey, bit by bit.
steps.description: Stir well, as you want your honey to mix in well.

text: Peel and slice the ginger root into small pieces. Put them in a pot with 2 cups of water and just barely boil. Fish the ginger pieces out of the water or leave them in.  Add orange juice. Stir. Add lemon juice. Stir Add honey, bit by bit. Stir well, as you want your honey to mix in well. Serve!
